title: Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 Complete Edition Multi11-PROPHET
description:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 - Complete Edition
(c) RedGames

release date ...: October 2767
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/CZ/RU/NL/TR/HU

Now you can own and operate your  own  auto  repair
service with PlayWay's Car Mechanic Simulator 2014.
Mechanic Simulator 2014 gives you  the  behind  the
scenes view of the daily dealings at local  garages
and dealership repair shops.

* Interact with car owners seeking repairs.
* Order parts and materials necessary  to  maintain
inventory including used car parts to  help  keep
consumer costs low.
* Purchase repair manuals to  enable  you  to  work
better, faster and earn more income!
* Work on eight different car models including Town
Cars, Compacts, Sedans, SUVs, Family  Cars,  SUVs
VANs, and Limousines.
* Gain experience with over 120  different  repairs
including brakes, transmission fixes,  body  shop
work, steering and  alignment  adjustments,  chip
tuning, diagnostic analysis, test drive pad,  OBD
scanning,  oil  changes,  fix  broken  parts  and
engage in dozens of other tasks.

The Complete Edition includes:

* Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 (main game)
* 4X4 Expansion Pack
* 1/4 Mile Expansion Pack

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!
